H0.text: location of the ten commandments in the bible. Deuteronomy

H1.text: location of the ten commandments in the bible. Leviticus

H2.text: location of the ten commandments in the bible. Numbers

H3.text: location of the ten commandments in the bible. Exodus

A4.text: The text of the Ten Commandments appears in three markedly distinct versions in the Hebrew Bible: at Exodus 20:1–17, Deuteronomy 5:6–21, and the 'Ritual Decalogue' of Exodus 34:11–26.

A7.text: God revealed the Ten Commandments to the Israelites at Mount Sinai amidst thunder and fire.

A8.text: The tablets were later placed in the Ark of the Covenant.
